title: Citizenship of Zambia (Amendment) Regulations, 2022
content:
1st April, 2022 Statutory Instruments 89
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 27 OF 2022
The Citizenship of Zambia Act, 2016
(Act No. 33 of 2016)
The Citizenship of Zambia (Amendment) Regulations,
2022
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 45 of the Citizenship
of Zambia Act, 2016, the following Regulations are made:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Citizenship of Title and
Zambia (Amendment) Regulations, 2022, and shall be read as one commence-
ment
with the Citizenship of Zambia Regulations, 2017, in these
S.I. No. 50
Regulations referred to as the principal Regulations. of 2017
(2) These Regulations shall be deemed to have come into
operation on 1st January, 2022.
2. The principal Regulations are amended by the revocation Revocation
of the Second Schedule and the substitution therefor of the Schedule and
replacement
set out in the Appendix. of Second
Schedule
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K 4.00 each.
90 Statutory Instruments 1st April, 2022
APPENDIX
(Regulation 2)
SECOND SCHEDULE
(Regulations 4 and 19)

J. J. MWIIMBU,
Minister of Home Affairs
and Internal Security
LUSAKA
